title: letrag
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014230130/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Resources](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014230130/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Resources) : letrag**

Spanish and Galacian language type site with goodies on type classification, font search, a type glossary, font identification, type articles, and related information from others type blogs.

Spanish version: [http://es.letrag.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014230130/http:/es.letrag.com/ "http://es.letrag.com")

Galacian version: [http://gl.letrag.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014230130/http:/gl.letrag.com/ "http://gl.letrag.com")
author: letrag
